item.title: One thing I learnt from : Comic Villains
item.description: Works of literature are distilled form of human perception patterns. In a way, they are more real than non-fiction.

item.title: Five things I learnt from: Getting serious about money!
item.description: Seriously, am I qualified to sermon you on money? Have I made much wealth for myself?

item.title: Factfulness
item.description: Factfulness, by Hans Rosling So this year, I took a bold New Year Resolution: “50 Books a Year”.
